dict.acceptation: 低声说；私语；密谈，密谋坏事；私下说；
低语，耳语；飒飒声；[医]嗫音；传闻；

sent.trans: 悄悄地，悄悄地，悄悄地告诉我。

sent.orig: A voice seemed to whisper, whisper, the words too faint to hear.
sent.trans: 一个微弱的声音在低声耳语，说的什么听不清楚。

sent.orig: At last, there came a little rustling, whispering sound, all round the window: rustle, whisper, whisper.
sent.trans: 最后，她又听到了轻轻的沙沙声，还有人在悄悄说话的声音。

sent.orig: Please, Becky -- I'll whisper it, I'll whisper it ever so easy."
sent.trans: 求求你，贝基——我小声说，我轻轻地说。”

sent.orig: The whisper a beautiful woman can be heard farther than the loud call of duty.
sent.trans: 美人的吴侬软语，较诸大声疾呼的义务之声，更可以传诸远方。
